abstract: Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova will meet Victoria Azarenka in the final of the WTA Championships in Istanbul; other tennis developments noted.
snippet: The Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova will meet Victoria Azarenka in the final of the WTA Championships in Istanbul.
lead_paragraph: The Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova will meet Victoria Azarenka in the final of the WTA Championships in Istanbul.

headline.main: Kvitova and Azarenka in WTA Final
headline.seo: Kvitova and Azarenka in WTA Final
